<a id="export"></a>
## `pino([options], [destination]) => logger`

The exported `pino` function takes two optional arguments,
[`options`](#options) and [`destination`](#destination), and
returns a [logger instance](#logger).

<a id=options></a>
### `options` (Object)

#### `name` (String)

Default: `undefined`

The name of the logger.
